snippet: Some major tech companies are planning big product announcements this week, hoping to grab the news media's undivided attention before Apple announces its new iPhone on Sept. 12. Read more »
abstract: Some major tech companies are planning big product announcements this week, hoping to grab the news media's undivided attention before Apple announces its new iPhone on Sept. 12. Read more »

headline.main: Rivals Jostle Before Apple Announces New iPhone
